eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Meng Tieyi tells Lin Yühsia his true intentions, and the events that have transpired in Yumen over the past several decades. The Shanhaizhong show up again, intending to steal the Catastrophe data.

attributes.content: (They work well together... how many of them are there?)
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (Growls)
attributes.name: Fierce Animal

attributes.content: Hey, why did they stop?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Why are they looking for you?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I'm Waai Fu. Even if they read my name like Huai Hu around here.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Waai Fu, Huai Hu... I'll remember.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I'm Jieyun.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: I'll come back and find you.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Wait—
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Strange girl...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Let's catch some bad people first.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: The old man gazes over the map, drawing a course.
His gaze moves slowly. He knows how vast a distance every inch on the paper represents.
The tea on the table has long grown cold.
I didn't think you would enjoy our provincial Yumen tea, Grand Tutor.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Everyone here drinks the same tea. So can I.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: This tea is Yin in nature. It's not ideal while the weather is cold.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Your knowledge is vast, but you don't pay enough attention to your health.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The others would be anxious if you fell ill.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Someone better will take my place, if I fall ill. Each generation is better than the one that came before. There is no single person whom Yan cannot do without.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: What is important is not one person, one generation, but the legacy.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Such has always been the way.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Legacy.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: A difficult concept for us to understand.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You've taught countless people who've contributed to Great Yan.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The army still uses the martial records left behind by the Record Keepers for training. I myself have received military instruction from you.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: At the end of the day, I, we, our expertise, it was all learned from others.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Chongyue dumps the cold tea and pours a new cup of hot tea.
Thank you.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Since when have we become strangers?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I've never forgotten the times when we discussed matters of state over candlelight, and drew swords alongside one another.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: But where we stand has changed.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Excuse my impudence.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You didn't come just to talk about old times, did you?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I came to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Here I am.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Hello, Envoy Lin.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Wasn't it two days ago that we last saw each other?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: More has happened in two days than in the twenty years prior.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, you did what you did that day not to help me, but to stop me from investigating.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I still helped you.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I had heard that the L.G.D. sent an acting inspector to oversee matters of public security when the two cities were docked.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I could not associate the commotion you caused at the market and the Sword Forge with the young girl who stands before me now.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Did you set your sights on me from the beginning?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: No, only just now.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I wasn't sure that all this was your doing, until you showed up.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You only suspected?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: That was enough.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Your style is... unique.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I've always been like this. Did you want to say 'unscrupulous?'
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Could you really call all that you have done scrupulous?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Fair enough. But what specifically did you mean by 'all that?'
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Working with the Shanhaizhong, faking the bandit attack on the Messenger, then setting up an attack on me, making the fake Catastrophe data 'real.'
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Then you had someone else steal the Grandmaster's sword to muddy the waters.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: The theft of the sword was unexpected. Otherwise, last night would never have happened...
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But it is impressive that you've deduced the switching of the data.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Good thing you had enough decency to not actually kill the Messenger.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I have a question myself. Why?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'm sure you already know the answer.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You wanted to cause a Catastrophe and destroy Yumen just because you had a grudge against the Lord Exorcist?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Zuo Xuanliao and us have been through more than hell and high water together. The word 'grudge' is far too light.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: And Zuo Xuanliao has taken us too lightly.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You are from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I've heard it's a good place. A prosperous one. I never had a chance to visit.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You've seen how things are at Yumen. Traveling through the desert all year long, risking Catastrophe to deliver important reports, trekking through nothing but sand for days in search of water... you've never experienced that.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Someone has to protect the borders, protect the nation.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Soldier or civilian, most Yumenites are not local. We left our homes to settle here, without a word of complaint.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Zuo Xuanliao should not forget that there are others who had a hand in Yumen becoming Yan's bulwark! Who does he think he is? Driving away those who have bled for Yumen?!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You misunderstood the Lord Exorcist.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Then why is the Grandmaster leaving Yumen?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: What I can't understand is why you want to destroy the city that you've protected for so many years.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: How many Catastrophes do you think Yumen has encountered in its history?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: A single Catastrophe won't destroy Yumen. It will only unite its people!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: ...Madman.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Two young people cower in a corner of a warehouse, looking rather haggard.
The Qis...
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Where are the others? What about the soldiers and the Messenger?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Old Meng from the Sword Forge let them go just now.
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: Thank goodness they're alright.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: M-Miss Du...
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: I'm sorry, we didn't get the job done.
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: The guys from the Sword Forge knocked us out before we even knew what was going on. We found ourselves in the warehouse by the time we came to.
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: Why did they do that?
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: It's a long story.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Come on, stop with the long face!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: B-But it's Xingyu Logistics's first job...
attributes.name: Young Bodyguard

attributes.content: We ran into something this big on our first job! That means we're meant for big things!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: Now put yourself together and follow me!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: I have an idea of where the sword is.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: You had an idea from the beginning.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Just a little private interest. I guess I couldn't keep it from you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Everyone has private interests.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: That's fine, as long as it doesn't interfere with duty.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: I have an idea whom to entrust the sword to. I just want to see the last trial through.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: With your permission, of course.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The goodbye you mentioned, it's more than just this.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The path ahead is unknown. Who knows if we'll meet again? A proper farewell is in order.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yumen is headed for the capital.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: It is about to wake.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The old man turns around and once again casts his eyes towards the map. He sees and thinks about much on it.
He suddenly has a question, one that the 'Grand Tutor' would not have asked.
Do you have regrets?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Parting is a fact of life. Seeking perfection doesn't mean there won't be regrets.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But sometimes I feel that there just isn't much I can do.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yumen started out as a fortress built for that hunt.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The hero of Yumen could have humble beginnings, or he could belong to one of the long-lived races, but the one thing he cannot be is the incarnation of a Feranmut.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: This is a secret that the Sui Regulator must protect at all costs.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: One cannot expect to be understood and accepted no matter where one goes...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The man walks slowly to the old man's side, and the two of them gaze silently at the depiction of mountains and rivers.
Yumen will approach the capital in six months, barring any unexpected events.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The markings on the map are locations where civilians are expected to be evacuated prior to Yumen's arrival at the capital.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: If things get to that point, Yumen must be prepared to sacrifice itself to kill the bestial Sui. This is a price that Yan must pay.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: The Shanhaizhong struck twenty years ago. Lord Exorcist came to me after things calmed down, before the Sui Regulator arrived.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: He realized then that the bestial Sui were a great potential threat to Yan. Yumen will someday return to its original battlefield.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: When it comes to that, Yumen cannot rely on me or the jianghu fighters. Everyone must go. This place that many people have called home will return to dust.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: People on the outside call the Lord Exorcist heartless, but there's so much that he cannot tell anyone.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We had a group of common friends...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Those who carry heavy responsibilities cannot be trapped by private sentiment.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Twenty years of conflict. There were misunderstandings, and there were grudges, but there must be closure. This is something that I need to do myself.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: This is a private request. I dare not ask for your understanding.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yet in some cases, an allowance can be made.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Shuo is part of that atrocity, but the people of Yan owe Chongyue a great debt.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: So what you mean is...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The Lord Exorcist has tasked you to ensure my safety.
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: What danger is there to me, if you can protect Yumen?
attributes.name: Grand Tutor

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The man turns and leaves the tent.
The old man nods slightly in his direction.
Lord Wei...
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I can be of help in the hunt for the criminals.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I will see you off.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The air feels dead, silent. The only sound is that of gravel as it falls on the roof.
The warehouse has no windows. Lin Yühsia listens intently for any sounds outside. Minute after minute passes. Have the Catastrophe clouds drawn closer?
The night winds blow stronger.
You look impatient, Miss Lin.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Thank you for chatting with this old man. Perhaps it's because you thought I may still have the real data collected by the Catastrophe Messenger.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Take it.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Why would you give it away for nothing?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: It's too late for Yumen to avoid the Catastrophe now, even if the correct data reached the Imperial Astronomical Bureau.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I would like to make it clear that this plan was entirely my own. The folks who were taken into custody are innocent.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Good to see you still know what 'innocent' is, after putting an entire city's worth of people in danger.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: There is act of nature, and there is act of man. They should not be confused.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You must have other reasons for delaying me.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Of course. I would not simply waste time on a day like today.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I had promised to help an acquaintance leave the city, but I have no choice but to go back on that promise after what happened at the Sword Forge last night. I can only hope to draw more attention and make it easier for her to get out.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The sword thief? Didn't you say the theft was unexpected?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Astute as ever.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But this is a rather silly matter. Too silly to talk about.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Let those who should leave, leave. Let the debts that should be settled, be settled.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You got what you came for, Miss Lin. You should leave.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: There was one thing you didn't catch.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It's not just Zuo Xuanliao I hold a grudge against.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I picked this time and place to settle another debt.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You hide well. You made us work to find you.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You turned your back on our partnership.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Weren't you trying to silence me when you went to the Sword Forge last night?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Get the data from the girl. Leave this one to me.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Aye.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: Maybe you misunderstood.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: The old man opens a bag on his belt and takes out an unremarkable black iron hammer.
He glares at the Shanhaizhong and speaks through clenched teeth.
Hide? I've been waiting for a chance to finish all of you off!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi
